synopsis.text: Youyun Mountain becomes the backdrop for Yang Chen's journey to protect his family and their legacy as he awakens his Tao soul and weapon spirit, Huangyu. As the grandson of the Yang family's patriarch, Yang Chen had always been the subject of ridicule for not manifesting his powers. However, when he discovers a plot led by his uncle to usurp his grandfather's position, Yang Chen becomes determined to strengthen himself. Alone, he ventures to the mountain in search of medicine, ultimately uncovering the conspiracy and securing his family's rightful place. Prepare for a tale of growth, courage, and loyalty in this thrilling anime.
